question: What will be the price of Bitcoin (BTC/USD) on November 7, 2025?
description: Predict Bitcoin's price at market resolution. Current price: $104,000
resolutionCriteria:
This market resolves using the Bitcoin (BTC/USD) price reported by CoinGecko at 20:00:00 UTC on 2025-11-07.

The final price will be the floor price (removing decimals) of the reported price for settlement.
Only the CoinGecko API will be used as the data source.
In case of any downtime, the last available price before 20:00:00 UTC will be used.
Market range: $90.0k - $110.0k
